definitions.definition: A spicy tomato sauce of Mexican origin , often including onions and hot peppers .
A style of urban music originally from New York heavily influenced by Cuban dance music , jazz and rock .
Any of several dances performed to salsa music.

main_definition: ( countable ) A spicy tomato sauce of Mexican origin , often including onions and hot peppers .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , music ) A style of urban music originally from New York heavily influenced by Cuban dance music , jazz and rock .
( countable , dance ) Any of several dances performed to salsa music.
